Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI has developed and documented these elements in their process safety management plan (PSM). The PSM plan is incorporated with this document by reference.
Key personnel are responsible for conducting and implementing the findings from the Process Hazard Analysis (PHA) for the ammonia systems. Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI utilizes outside sources for emergency response and coordinates with responders on an annual basis. Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI policy is to construct all new equipment, systems, and facilities to ensure the appropriate safety and release prevention systems are included from the beginning of each project. Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI maintains a computerized program of maintenance activities to ensure that key systems are maintained appropriately to minimize the risk of a release. Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI is committed to providing appropriate training to all employees.
Regarding safety procedures, each new employee is provided comprehensive safety training during their initial orientation for the facility. 
Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI conducts regularly scheduled safety training for all employees each year. Additional training is provided to maintenance personnel for the systems
they are responsible for; this includes PPE training.

4. Five-year accident history. 
No reportable accident in the last five years. 

5. The emergency response program.
 Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI has coordination with the local fire department as the primary responders for all emergencies at the facility.
A written Emergency Response Plan has been developed and is on record at the Facility. 

6. Planned changes to improve safety: This facility will continually inspect and upgrade equipment as required.

EPA RISK MANAGEMENT PLAN
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY 
Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI

1. Accident Release Prevention Program and Emergency Response Policy

It is the policy of the Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI facility management to
implement the requirements of this Risk Management Program (RMP) in accordance with the USEPA regulations under 40 CFR Part 68 and with the corresponding regulations under OSHA's Process Safety Management(PSM)program. The objective is to minimize the risk of a
release of a hazardous material and if a release occurs, to minimize the potential impact to Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI employees, the public and the environment. This objective will be accomplished by utilizing generally accepted good operating procedures,
providing appropriate training to all employees, and coordinating response activities, as necessary, with the local emergency response providers. This plan covers all Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI owned activities at this facility.

Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI management is committed to providing the resources necessary to implement this policy.

2. Facility Description
Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI is a food processing facility that uses anhydrous ammonia as a refrigerant throughout the facility. 


3. The general accidental release prevention program. 
Artisan Bread Co., LLC Warren, MI facility is governed by a set of OSHA and USEPA regulations that require planning and facility activities intended to prevent a release of hazardous material, or if a release inadvertently occurs, to minimize the consequences of a release to the employees of the facility, the public and to the environment. These regulations include:
40 CFR Part 68, Accidental Release Prevention
40 CFR Part 112, Spill Prevention, Control and Countermeasure
29 CFR Part 119, Process Safety Management
40 CFR Part 302, Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act (EPCRA)
